title: Ownership structure of First Bancorp (North Carolina)

content.text:
First Bancorp has a significant number of institutional investors, which indicates interest from larger investment firms. Some of the major institutional shareholders of First Bancorp include:

1. The Vanguard Group: The Vanguard Group is the largest institutional shareholder of First Bancorp, owning approximately 12.5% of the shares.

2. BlackRock: BlackRock is another major institutional investor in First Bancorp, owning around 10.8% of the shares.

3. Dimensional Fund Advisors: Dimensional Fund Advisors holds a significant stake in First Bancorp, owning approximately 7.9% of the shares.

Insider ownership in First Bancorp is also notable, indicating that company insiders have a vested interest in the performance of the stock. Some of the notable insiders with ownership in First Bancorp include:

1. Richard H. Moore: Richard H. Moore, the CEO of First Bancorp, owns approximately 0.8% of the shares.

2. Michael G. Mayer: Michael G. Mayer, the President of First Bancorp, has ownership of around 0.6% of the shares.

3. James C. Crawford III: James C. Crawford III, a Director of First Bancorp, holds approximately 0.3% of the shares.
